title: Can't Post in Concepts in Creations?
body: I wanted to post something in concepts and creations now that I've recently hit level 6 (the required level to post there) but it still says that I need to be level 6. I've tried refreshing and relogging, and nothing's working. Any help?

replies.body: Sometimes it can take a bit for your account to sync up with the boards when you post for the first time.  Everything looks okay now, but let me know if you run into any issues.

I'm having the same issue again but with posting in Gameplay. I've been at least level 7 for about 10 hours now, and I still can't post in Gameplay. For concepts and creations, it only took about 20 minutes, so I'm not sure what's going on.

There shouldn't been any issues preventing you from posting, but I've booped your account for a refresh just in case.  You might need to clear your [cache and cookies](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies), disable extensions, or try another browser just in case some possibilities need to be ruled out.  Let me know if that helps.
It's all fixed now, thank you :).
